emuInput.TitMainTitle: Ethelyn Sanders and Alonzo R. Sanders examining piece of burned railroad flare, and seated on patterned armchair in their home in Washington, Pennsylvania, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 10, 1958, pg. 3, reads: "Evidence? - Mr. and Mrs. Alonzo R. Sanders of 52 Shannon Ave., Washington, Pa., examine a piece of a burned out railroad flare which was found several yards away from their new home, which was under construction prior to fire burning it down to its foundation, on Christy Rd., at Eighty-Four, Pa., last week. Presence of the flare has not been explained. Police and firemen report they have been unable to find any evidence of arson. - Harris Photo."
